description: Performance Year 2015 (Payment Year 2017). Value Modifier (VM) Public Use File (PUF) - The Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services (CMS) has created a standard analytical file intended to promote transparency. For each VM performance year, CMS will publish a PUF that contains VM performance results of de-identified practices that were subject to the VM program. CMS provides supporting documentation for each PUF that contains the field name, length, type, label, description, and notes for each variable included in the PUF.

columns.name: STATE
columns.description: State in which practice is located

columns.name: NUM_EPS_VM
columns.description:
Practice eligible professional count category
0 EPs=Zero eligible professionals, 1-9 EPs=One to nine eligible professionals, 10 to 99 EPs=10 to 99 eligible professionals, 100+ EPs=100 or more eligible professionals.

columns.name: MSSP
columns.description: Indicator for whether practice was a MSSP ACO practice in performance year 2015 	Equals 1 if practice was a MSSP ACO practice in performance year 2015

columns.name: GPRO
columns.description:
Indicator for whether practice registered to report data to the PQRS via the Group Practice Reporting Option (GPRO)
Equals 1 if practice registered to report data to the PQRS via the Group Practice Reporting Option (GPRO).

columns.name: ELIG_UP_ADJUST
columns.description: Indicator for whether practice eligible for additional upward payment adjustment for treating disproportionate share of high-risk beneficiaries 	N/A=Practice not subject to 2017 Value Modifier or practice did not meet minimum 2015 PQRS reporting requirements, Eligible=Practice eligible for additional upward payment adjustment for treating disproportionate share of high-risk beneficiaries, Not Eligible=Practice not eligible for additional upward payment adjustment for treating disproportionate share of high-risk beneficiaries.

columns.name: CATEGORY
columns.description:
Practice met minimum 2015 PQRS reporting requirements.	CAT1=Practice subject to the 2017 Value Modifier and met minimum 2015 PQRS reporting requirements.

CAT2=Practice subject to the 2017 Value Modifier and did not meet minimum 2015 PQRS reporting requirements.

columns.name: VM_PAYMENT_ADJ
columns.description:
Value Modifier payment adjustment for practices subject to the Value Modifier	

N/A=Practice not subject to 2017 Value Modifier. AF stands for Adjustment Factor.

columns.name: UPDATED_VM
columns.description:
Value Modifier payment adjustment, incorporating Informal Review change, if applicable. 
AF stands for Adjustment Factor.

columns.name: COST_COMP_TIER_TEXT
columns.description: Cost Composite Tier value determined based on Cost Composite Score (High, Average, Low, N/A)	N/A=Practice not subject to 2017 Value Modifier or practice did not meet minimum 2015 PQRS reporting requirements, Low=Practice's Cost Composite Score is at least one standard deviation below benchmark and statistically significantly different from benchmark, Average=Practice's Cost Composite Score is less than one standard deviation away from the benchmark, practice's Cost Composite Score is at least one standard deviation from benchmark but not statistically significantly different from benchmark, or practice does not have at least minimum number of eligible cases for any cost measures included in Cost Composite, High=Practice's Cost Composite Score is at least one standard deviation above benchmark and statistically significantly different from benchmark.

columns.name: QUAL_COMP_TIER_TEXT
columns.description: Quality Composite Tier value determined based on Quality Composite Score (High, Average, Low, N/A)	N/A=Practice not subject to 2017 Value Modifier or practice did not meet minimum 2015 PQRS reporting requirements, Low=Practice's Quality Composite Score is at least one standard deviation below benchmark and statistically significantly different from benchmark, Average=Practice's Quality Composite Score is less than one standard deviation away from the benchmark, practice's Quality Composite Score is at least one standard deviation from benchmark but not statistically significantly different from benchmark, or practice does not have at least minimum number of eligible cases for any quality measures with prior-year benchmark included in Quality Composite, High=Practice's Quality Composite Score is at least one standard deviation above benchmark and statistically significantly different from benchmark.

columns.name: ZB_COST_CMPSCR_POOL_RND
columns.description: Standardized Cost Composite Score, rounded to the nearest 0.01

columns.name: ZB_QUAL_CMPSCR_POOL_RND
columns.description: Standardized Quality Composite Score, rounded to the nearest 0.01

name: Value Modifier PUF Performance Year 2015
